metadata.title: CVE-2024-50000 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5e: Fix NULL deref in mlx5e_tir_builder_alloc()In mlx5e_tir_builder_alloc() kvzalloc() may return NULLwhich is dereferenced on the next line in a referenceto the modify field.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
